CustomDataType.description: This class does not get 'AdditionalProperties = false' in the schema generation, so it can be extended with arbitrary JSON properties to allow adding custom data.

EventNotificationEnumType.description: Specifies the event notification type of the message.

EventTriggerEnumType.description: Type of monitor that triggered this event, e.g. exceeding a threshold value.

name.description: Name of the component. Name should be taken from the list of standardized component names whenever possible. Case Insensitive. strongly advised to use Camel Case.

instance.description: Name of instance in case the component exists as multiple instances. Case Insensitive. strongly advised to use Camel Case.

EventDataType.description: Class to report an event notification for a component-variable.

eventId.description: Identifies the event. This field can be referred to as a cause by other events.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the moment the report was generated.

cause.description: Refers to the Id of an event that is considered to be the cause for this event.

actualValue.description:
Actual value (_attributeType_ Actual) of the variable.

The Configuration Variable <<configkey-reporting-value-size,ReportingValueSize>> can be used to limit GetVariableResult.attributeValue, VariableAttribute.value and EventData.actualValue. The max size of these values will always remain equal.

techCode.description: Technical (error) code as reported by component.

techInfo.description: Technical detail information as reported by component.

cleared.description: _Cleared_ is set to true to report the clearing of a monitored situation, i.e. a 'return to normal'.

transactionId.description: If an event notification is linked to a specific transaction, this field can be used to specify its transactionId.

variableMonitoringId.description: Identifies the VariableMonitoring which triggered the event.

EVSEType.description:
EVSE
urn:x-oca:ocpp:uid:2:233123
Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment

id.description:
Identified_ Object. MRID. Numeric_ Identifier
urn:x-enexis:ecdm:uid:1:569198
EVSE Identifier. This contains a number (> 0) designating an EVSE of the Charging Station.

connectorId.description: An id to designate a specific connector (on an EVSE) by connector index number.

name.description: Name of the variable. Name should be taken from the list of standardized variable names whenever possible. Case Insensitive. strongly advised to use Camel Case.

instance.description: Name of instance in case the variable exists as multiple instances. Case Insensitive. strongly advised to use Camel Case.

generatedAt.description: Timestamp of the moment this message was generated at the Charging Station.

tbc.description: “to be continued” indicator. Indicates whether another part of the report follows in an upcoming notifyEventRequest message. Default value when omitted is false.

seqNo.description: Sequence number of this message. First message starts at 0.
